articles.title: Kim Jong Un Assumes Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Assumes Supreme Commander

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, assumed the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army at the behest of leader Kim Jong Il on Oct. 8 Juche 100 (2011).

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commander Hailed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commander Hailed

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, assumed the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 This is a historic event reflecting the unanimous will of the servicepersons and people to defend the dignity of the country and the red flag of the revolution by dint of arms under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party and people of Korea, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It was President Kim Il Sung's foresighted resolve and Kim Jong Il's intention to defend the country and the nation with arms.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who came from the blood of the revolutionary family of Mt. Paektu, has all qualifications and traits befitting a statesman and military strategist of modern times. 
					
					 He has wisely led the army, accompanying Kim Jong Il in inspecting army units.
					
					 His assumption of the supreme commandership provides sure guarantee for glorifying the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the army building and carrying forward the cause of the Songun (military-first) revolution generation after generation.
					
					 The Korean army and people are rising up from the bitterest sorrow for the loss of the great father of the nation, encouraged by the supreme commander's colors, an invincible banner of their life and struggle. 
					
					 They are determined to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Report on Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Report on Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was held here on Friday.
					
					 Present there were members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The meeting courteously proclaimed that the dear respected Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, assumed the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army according to the behest of leader Kim Jong Il on October 8, Juche 100 (2011).
					
					 All the participants stood up to welcome him with enthusiastic applause.
					
					 The meeting adopted the decision of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK "On Effecting a Great Surge in Building a Thriving Nation True to the Behests of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The decision said that the army and people of the DPRK are overcome with pain and grief over so early demise of Kim Jong Il to their regret and are renewing their firm pledge to carry forward and accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, at the behest of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Born as a son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution and grown up to be a great revolutionary, Kim Jong Il suffered all sorts of the most unbearable hardships in the world for the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness for decades since he made a historic declaration that he would glorify Korea all over the world on Ryongnam Hill in his early years. He breathed his last at work on a train while making the most arduous forced march till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of Juche-based ideas, theories and method and comprehensively developed them in depth as required by the era and the developing revolution. He strengthened and developed the WPK, army and state into the party, army and state of the President under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea and put the dignity of the nation and state power on the highest level.
					
					 It was under his wise leadership that the WPK could display its might as an invincible party which firmly established a monolithic ideological system and achieved a harmonious whole with the popular masses, our revolutionary armed forces could demonstrate its might as a matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, the world-startling miracles and changes could be created in economic construction and a new era of literary and art renaissance in the 20th century could be ushered in.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, the supreme incarnation of the revolutionary moral obligation, set a noble example in accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President, the cause unprecedented in the human history of politics, thus making sure that his noble and august name and his immortal revolutionary career and feats always shed rays along with the eternal history of Juche Korea.
					
					 He honorably defended the socialist gains, the precious legacies of the President, by dint of Songun despite the collapse of the world socialist system, the great loss to the nation, the vicious offensive of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and severe natural disasters. He performed undying feats by turning the DPRK into an invincible political and ideological power united single-mindedly and a powerful nuclear weapons state and a state capable of launching satellites which no enemy dares provoke.
					
					 In the era of Kim Jong Il the DPRK emerged a great independent power which no one dares provoke after putting a final end to the history of all sorts of foreign aggression and intervention and embarked upon the road of pushing forward the building of a socialist economic power in all fields with a sure political and military guarantee.
					
					 The decision noted that Kim Jong Il, the genius of creation and construction, unrolled a grandiose blueprint for building an economic power, foreseeing victory in future in the grim days of the struggle for defending socialism, and wisely led an all-people general onward movement to carry it out.
					
					 On the basis of his lucid insight into the trend of economic development in the 21st century he explored the untrodden path of the CNC-based industrialization in the days of the Arduous March, the forced march and worked heart and soul to realize it. Thanks to his clairvoyant foresight and wise leadership, an exciting gun roar was sounded for the industrial revolution in the new century and the DPRK's economy was transferred into the age of knowledge-based economy, a stirring reality.
					
					 He visited again and again every nook and corner of the country including underground mining face with water dropping from its ceiling and windy construction sites of power stations despite sweltering weather and torrential rain in the hottest period of summer, intense cold and strong snowstorm of midwinter. He thus energetically led the all-people onward movement for a great surge to greet 2012. Thanks to his forced march, victories and changes heralding happiness and prosperity in future took place one after another and torch lit in South Hamgyong Province calling upon the whole party and country and all the people to make a final charge raged fiercely.
					
					 The whole life of Kim Jong Il was the most brilliant life of the peerless legendary hero born of Heaven and peerless patriot who laid an ever-lasting foundation for the eternal prosperity of the country and the nation, spending all his life under a program for field work with the supreme command on the forefront of the revolution.
					
					 Standing at the helm of the Korean revolution is Kim Jong Un, the only successor to Kim Jong Il, the decision said, calling upon all the party members, servicepersons and people to turn sorrow into thousand-fold strength and courage and more dynamically struggle to win a great fresh victory in the Juche revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Underlining the need to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the WPK and revolution and glorify his sacred revolutionary life and undying revolutionary feats forever, the decision referred to the relevant decisions.
					
					 The decision also called for more dynamically accelerating the cause of building a thriving socialist nation true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It underlined the need to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the only center of unity, cohesion and leadership of the WPK, devotedly defend him politically and ideologically and give fuller play to the might of the political and ideological power.
					
					 It called for giving fuller play to the might of the socialist military power and firmly defend the gains of revolution, invariably adhering to the Songun idea and the Songun revolutionary line of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Stressing the need to make the torch lit by Kim Jong Il in South Hamgyong Province, the torch for the industrial revolution in the new century, flare up all over the country to effect a great surge in building a socialist economic power, the decision set forth relevant tasks.
					
					 The decision called for turning the country into a highly civilized power in the 21st century where Kim Jong Il 's Juche-based idea of cultural construction is blooming in all fields. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK on the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Joint Calls of WPK Published
articles.content:
Joint Calls of WPK Published

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) --The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea published joint calls on Saturday on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The joint calls are as follows:
					
					 Having seen out Juche 100 (2011) with the greatest national sorrow over losing too suddenly, too early and too regrettably the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il, whom we had trusted and followed as in heaven, we are seeing in Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 Greeting the new year in tears of blood, all our Party members, service personnel and people look back with deep emotion upon the 100-year history of our nation which is resplendent with the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and are filled with the steel-like faith and will to turn the sorrow into one-thousand-fold strength and courage so as to achieve without fail the historic causes of the building of a thriving socialist country and national reunification and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the supreme leader Comrade Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 In the last 100 years an epochal change took place in our nation’s ideas and spirit and in the appearance, might and position of our country and a golden age of prosperity unprecedented in the 5 000-year history of our nation was ushered in under the wise leadership of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il; it was an era of great victory and glory. 
					
					 Born of the working people in a simple straw-thatched house in Mangyongdae on April 15, Juche 1 (1912) and endowed with brilliant wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and ennobling virtues, which nobody had ever been possessed of, the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung opened the new history of Juche Korea and achieved exploits immortal in the history of our people’s revolutionary struggle and the history of struggle for human emancipation by dint of profound ideas and theories and grandiose revolutionary practice. 
					
					 He was an eminent ideo-theoretician and a great teacher who instilled in our people the ideological consciousness of independence and indomitable mental strength by authoring the immortal Juche idea, an ever-victorious, iron-willed commander who opened, by defeating two formidable imperialist powers, the way to revival for our nation when it was at the crossroads of life and death and a genius of revolution and construction who built on the debris a socialist country, independent, self-sufficient and self-reliant in national defence, by leading to victory two stages of social revolution, two rounds of reconstruction and several stages of socialist construction; his revolutionary exploits shine their brilliance in the 100-year history of Juche Korea. 
					
					 He was not only the founding father of socialist Korea, he was the sun of the nation who provided the three charters and motive force for national reunification and gained exploits imperishable in the history of our nation’s reunification movement, and a pre-eminent leader of the world socialist movement and the lodestar of human emancipation who indicated the road of struggle for the progressive mankind by opening a new era of independence by means of the shining Juche idea and creating a worldwide model of revolution and construction. 
					
					 Etched in the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation resplendent with victory and glory is the sacred revolutionary activities of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il who inherited Comrade Kim Il Sung 's ideas and leadership and led our Party, army and people along the road filled with victory. 
					
					 Born of guerrillas on Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution, on February 16, Juche 31 (1942), the period when national liberation was dawning, Comrade Kim Jong Il grew up into a great revolutionary and, regarding it as his lifelong duty to inherit the revolutionary cause of Juche and accomplish it down through generations, vigorously advanced the revolution and construction in accordance with the great Comrade Kim Il Sung's ideas and intentions as his closest and most faithful comrade. 
					
					Holding high the banner of modelling the whole society on the Juche idea, he developed our Party, army and state into those of Comrade Kim Il Sung, set an ennobling example in realizing the cause of immortalizing the leader with a revolutionary sense of moral obligation unprecedented in the political history of mankind, ushered in a golden age of the Workers’ Party in all the political, military, economic and cultural fields, and raised the nation’s dignity and might to the highest level. 
					
					 In the face of the breakdown of the world socialist system, the passing away of the father of the nation, the vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces to encircle and suffocate the country and the severe natural calamities, he defended with honour the socialist gains, the valuable heritage bequeathed by the fatherly leader, by dint of Songun politics, and turned our country into an invincible political and ideological power based on single-hearted unity and a nuclear state with unrivalled military strength no enemy would dare challenge. This is shining as the greatest of his achievements. 
					
					By setting the ambitious goal of building a thriving country and vigorously making a high-intensity forced march for on-site guidance up until the last moment of his life, he stood in the van of an all-people advance for a great upsurge, ensured that the flames of the industrial revolution in the new century and the flames of Hamnam were spread across the country following the flames of Kangson, and thus opened a new vista for the building of an economic power.  
					
					He was held in boundless respect and high esteem by all the Korean people as the father of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification as he ushered in the June 15 reunification era by applying the noble ideal of By Our Nation Itself, and enjoyed high international prestige as a great defender of socialism and justice for the undying contributions he rendered to the world socialist movement and the cause of independence of mankind under the unfurled banner of anti-imperialist independence.
					
					 He was, indeed, a peerless patriot and the most outstanding veteran statesman in the present era, who, with the Supreme Headquarters on the frontline of the revolution, spent his whole life in the field, dedicating it entirely to the prosperity of his country, well-being of his people and the cause of global independence, thus accumulating achievements imperishable in the history of the Korean nation and mankind.
					
					 Despite the great feats he had performed for his country and people and for the times and history, the peerlessly great man disallowed setting up even one statue of his own, but his noble image and great exploits are enshrined in the hearts of our service personnel and people as a grand, eternal monument.
					
					 It is the greatest pride of our nation that it produced such great leaders as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, geniuses of mankind and peerless; legendary persons, and under their leadership our Party could develop into a seasoned and authoritative party guiding the era of independence, and our revolutionary armed forces into a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, and our people could demonstrate their dignity of being a revolutionary people pioneering the untrodden path to socialism.
					
					 Our nation has never witnessed in its history the times like the       Kim Il Sung era and Kim Jong Il era, when the Juche character and national identity became the strongest, and the national dignity and might were exalted at the highest. The 100-year history of Juche Korea adorned with victory and glory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il adds lustre to the 5 000-year history of our nation and guarantees its bright future for all eternity.
					
					 To hold the great leaders in high esteem through all eternity and faithfully carry forward and accomplish under the leadership of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered on Mt. Paektu is the revolutionary duty and noble moral obligation of our service personnel and people, the descendants of Comrade Kim Il Sung and the soldiers and followers of Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On our advance to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche we will be greeting the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and 70th birthday of General Kim Jong Il.
					
					 These anniversaries will serve as historic occasions, which will demonstrate to the world the invariable revolutionary faith and noble sense of moral obligation of our service personnel and people who are determined to resolutely safeguard and bring glory through generations to the immortal exploits the two leaders achieved in the revolution and carry out without fail the revolutionary cause of Juche, united single-heartedly around the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We must celebrate the birth anniversaries as the most auspicious events as befits the descendants of President Kim Il Sung and the soldiers and followers of General Kim Jong Il, and true to the lifetime instructions of the General open the gates of a prosperous and powerful country in Juche 101 (2012) without fail, registering a new victory in the Juche-based revolution.
					
					 Arduous is the road ahead of our revolution and gigantic are the tasks facing us. However, as long as we have the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and the valuable revolutionary heritage the great leaders created with painstaking efforts throughout their lives?the ever-victorious, steel-strong Workers’ Party of Korea, the great army-people unity around it, the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, and the solid foundations of the self-supporting national economy?our revolution will surely emerge victorious, and we will have no difficulties which we are unable to overcome and no fortresses which we are unable to capture.
					
					 Calling on the entire Party, the whole army and all the people to turn sorrow into one-thousand-fold strength and courage so as to strengthen the political and military might of the country to the maximum, kindle more fiercely the flames of a great revolutionary upsurge under the sagacious leadership of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, and thus glorify this significant year of Juche 101 (2012) as a year of great victory, when the steadfast continuity and invincibility of our revolution will be demonstrated to the world, and as a year of great prosperity, when the gates of a thriving country will be opened, the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers’ Party of Korea jointly publish slogans on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.    
					
					 All out for a general offensive to achieve the prosperity of the great Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea!
					
					 Let us greet the centenary of the birth of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the 70th birthday of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il with high political enthusiasm and brilliant feats of labour!
					
					 Let us fight and create as befits the descendants of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and the soldiers and followers of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us hold fast to the lifetime instructions of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the fighting programme of our Party, our army and our people and successfully carry them out!
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us! 
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us!
					
					 Let us hold the great General Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all eternity as the Sun of Songun!
					
					 Let us glorify the noble revolutionary career and undying exploits of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il for all generations to come!
					
					 Let us bring about a great upsurge in the building of a thriving nation true to the lifelong intentions and behests of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us do everything the way the great Comrade Kim Jong Il did!
					
					 Long live the great Juche idea and Songun idea!
					
					 Let us thoroughly implement the revolutionary principles, lines and policies advanced by the great General Kim Jong Il without the slightest concession and vacillation!
					
					 Make the world admire the great Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea!
					
					 Let us translate into practice the pledge taken in tears of blood before the great General’s bier!
					
					 Korea does what it is determined to do! 
					
					 Let us exalt the dignity of the great Kim Il Sung's country, General Kim Jong Il 's country, following the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					 The dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is the destiny of the country, the revolution and the people, and the banner of all victories!
					
					 Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un! 
					
					 Let the whole Party, the entire army and all the people unite firmly around the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					 As long as we are with the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, joy and sorrow and hardships of all descriptions are an honour. 
					
					 Let us carry on the march started from Mt. Paektu stoutly under the guidance of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					Let us rush forward in the Paektu spirit of offensive!
					
					At a go!
					
					 The Workers’ Party of Korea is a political guide of our army and people, and enhancing its militant efficiency and leadership role is a prerequisite to and a basic guarantee for accomplishing with credit the cause of the great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Long live the glorious Workers’ Party of Korea, which organizes and guides all victories of our people!
					
					 Let us effect a fresh turn in Party work in conformity with the demands of the momentous historic juncture in carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche!
					
					 Let us establish more thoroughly the monolithic leadership system of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un throughout the Party and society!
					
					 Let us apply the spirit of the Party Conference thoroughly to Party work!
					
					 Let the Party become an integrated whole of ideological purity and organizational unity for the death-defying defence of the leadership of the revolution!
					
					 Enhance the revolutionary character, organizational unity and militant efficiency of the Party organizations!
					
					 Let the Party cells develop into reliable foundation stones of the Party and its efficient basic organizations!
					
					 Let the entire Party turn out, and the whole country and all the people surge forward to mark the centenary of the birth of the great   leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the 70th birthday of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Focus all efforts of Party work on implementing the behests of the great General Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Render positive Party-oriented support to administrative and economic work! 
					
					 Let Party organizations become air blowers and accelerators on the onward march for a great upsurge!
					
					 Let us implement our Party’s revolutionary mass line to the letter!
					
					 The strength of the Party and the revolutionary ranks is their political and ideological strength and the flames of a great upsurge are the ones of ideology and mental strength. 
					
					 Let us give free rein to the might of the single-hearted unity through a general political and ideological offensive based on the theory of attaching importance to ideas!
					
					 Let us demonstrate the might of information and publicity work on the onward march for a great upsurge!
					
					 Be bold in improving the forms and methods of ideological work!
					
					 Conduct all information and publicity activities like the anti-Japanese guerrillas did!
					
					 Give full play to the masses’ mental strength by keeping up the drumbeat for encouraging economic activities!
					
					 Usher in a new golden age of mass culture by learning from the revolutionary soldier culture!
					
					 The line of three revolutions?ideological, technological and cultural?is the general line of our Party. 
					
					 Let us effectively wage the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement to fly the three red flags at all sites for a great upsurge!
					
					Supply services are just part of political work!
					
					The Korean People’s Army is the standard-bearer of the Songun-based revolution and the leading force of Songun politics that should firmly defend the great Comrade Kim Jong Il's ideas and cause by force of arms and take the lead in supporting the leadership of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All service personnel of the Korean People’s Army!
					
					 Hold your arms firmly and add eternal glory to the immortal history and achievements of the Songun revolution of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and Marshal Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Become the pillar and main force of the revolution standing in the van of the struggle to implement the Songun politics of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					 Let the whole army become today’s 7th Regiment and defend the leadership of the revolution unto death!
					
					 Establish more thoroughly the monolithic command system of the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un over the army! 
					
					 Greet with brilliant success in boosting your combat capabilities the centenary of the birth of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung, the 70th birthday of the great leader General Kim Jong Il and the 80th founding anniversary of the Korean People’s Army!
					
					 Possess the noble mental and moral traits required of the soldiers of a revolutionary army by accelerating transformation of yourselves into revolutionaries and socialist patriots!
					
					 Let the whole army become an integral whole of comrades!
					
					Thoroughly realize unity between officers and men and between army and people, and combination of military work with political affairs!
					
					 Serve the rank-and-file soldiers! 
					
					 Make companies elite units with invincible strength! 
					
					 Make companies dear homes for rank-and-file soldiers!
					
					 Assist the people!
					
					 Today’s training is a furnace for producing tomorrow’s combat heroes! 
					
					 Enforce strict military discipline across the army!
					
					 Maintain full readiness for a final showdown! 
					
					 To counter the enemy’s rash acts of provocation with a relentless annihilating strike and their “showdown” with an all-out showdown is the grit and mettle of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Make the reckless aggressors experience the might of the arms in the hands of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and know clearly what a genuine war is all about! 
					
					 Let us turn the Blue House and other bases for aggression into a lake of fire if the enemy dares attack, and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail! 
					
					 Make breakthroughs for onward advance on major fronts of building an economic giant and improving the people’s standard of living, at the charging speed of the heroic Korean People’s Army and in the attacking spirit of its a-match-for-a-hundred soldiers!
					
					 State security, people’s security, judicial and prosecution organs, discharge with credit the missions of defending the leader, the socialist system, the policies and the people!
					
					 Frustrate the moves of ideological and cultural infiltration by the imperialists!
					
					 Smash to pieces the practices that eat away at socialism!
					
					 All members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards!
					
					 Perfect combat readiness with a thoroughgoing concept of the enemy!
					
					 Let us perfect on a new, high level the arming of all the people and fortifying of the whole country!
					
					 Love the service personnel like kith and kin and actively assist them!
					
					 The powerful defence industry is the most precious inheritance of the Songun revolution bequeathed by the great General Kim Jong Il and the foremost bulwark of a prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Accelerate with greater vigour the work of putting the defence industry on a Juche, modern and scientific basis!
					
					 Consolidate more firmly the arsenal of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu!
					
					 Let the sector of the defence industry make an active contribution to the improving of the people’s standard of living!
					
					 To effect a decisive turn in the drive to build the country into an economic giant and improve the people’s standard of living is the sacred struggle to translate into reality the lifelong wish of the great General, who passed away on train on his high-intensity forced march of on-site guidance for the people’s welfare.
					
					 Officials and working people in South Hamgyong Province!
					
					 Make the flames of Hamnam, kindled by the great General, flare up more fiercely!
					
					 Officials and working people throughout the country!
					
					 Forward in a general offensive for a great victory in 2012, following the flames of Hamnam!
					
					 Let us achieve at all costs the goals for economic development set by the Party! 
					
					 Let the units associated with the visits by the great General stand in the van of the great upsurge!
					
					 Light industry is the major front in improving the people’s standard of living!
					
					 Workers in the sector of light industry!
					
					 Make the year 2012 a year when great achievements are made in light industry, a year when people enjoy the benefit of light industry!
					
					 Produce in larger quantities commodities which are favoured by people and have competitive edge in the world market!
					
					Radically increase the proportion of domestically made materials for light industry!
					
					 Push ahead with the upgrading of light-industry factories!
					
					Increase the kind of processed foodstuffs and upgrade their qualities!
					
					 Let us make the year 2012, which marks the 50th anniversary of the Changsong Joint Conference, a year when Changsong County demonstrates its potential and a year when great changes are made in the development of local industry!
					
					 Conduct vigorously the drive for producing August 3 consumer goods!
					
					 Bring about an improvement in commercial, public catering and welfare services!
					
					 Miners and working class in the Tanchon area!
					
					 You have in your hands a key to the development of light industry and improvement of people’s standard of living. 
					
					 Make a breakthrough in improving the people’s standard of living through increased production of lead, zinc and magnesite ores!
					
					 Make efforts to put the refractory industry on a solider Juche basis so as to hold supremacy in the world refractory market!
					
					Prosperity of the country depends on its full granaries!
					
					 Let us glorify the year 2012 as a year of a bumper harvest!
					
					 All the agricultural working people!
					
					 Farming is the great foundation for the building of a prosperous and powerful country!
					
					 Fulfil your duty as the master responsible for the nation’s granaries!
					
					 Let us thoroughly implement the Juche farming methods created by the fatherly leader Comrade Kim Il Sung!
					
					 Let us carry out to the letter the policy on agricultural revolution put forward by the great General Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Do farming in a scientific and technological way!   
					
					 Channel nationwide efforts into the agricultural front!
					
					 Raise a hot wind of competition in increasing the per-unit area yield!
					
					 Turn the country into a socialist paradise where all sorts of fruits thrive like a sea of apples at the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm!
					
					 Be proactive in introducing the organic farming method!
					
					 Heaps of compost are heaps of food grains. Produce a larger quantity of compost to make all the paddy and non-paddy fields fertile! 
					
					 Boost the production of agricultural produce by achieving cyclic production between farming and stockbreeding and between fruit farming and stockbreeding!
					
					 Put production at the stockbreeding bases and meat-processing factories on a normal footing to make the people’s diet bountiful!
					
					 Channel efforts into vegetable farming to supply people with larger quantities of vegetables!
					
					 Step up the reclamation projects on Ryongmae and Nunggum islets and at the Kwaksan tideland to widen the land of the country!
					
					 Step up the construction of waterways in South Hwanghae Province!
					
					 The electric-power, coal-mining and metallurgical industries and rail transport are the leading sectors of the national economy and the engine of the drive for a great upsurge!
					
					All efforts to the increased generation of electricity!
					
					 Hasten the completion of the Huichon Power Station, Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, Orangchon Power Station and Wonsan Army-People Power Station as quickly as possible!
					
					 Raise the efficiency of the generating equipment to the maximum to unconditionally carry out the plan for electric-power generation!
					
					 The sound of power generator is a pulse of the vibrant country.  
					
					Improve and perfect the network of distribution and supply of electricity, carefully stagger production and make a detailed control over the supply of electricity to make effective use of it!
					
					 Launch a dynamic mass campaign for the economic use of electricity!
					
					 Working people in the sector of the coal-mining industry!
					
					 Our Party firmly trusts in you as the point in the building of our country into an economic giant.
					
					 Let the coal-mining front take the lead in the drive for production!
					
					Give precedence to prospecting and tunnelling!
					
					 Concentrate investment on the coal mines with abundant deposits and favourable mining conditions!
					
					 Ensure a preferential and concentrated supply of the produced coal to the electric-power, metallurgical, chemical and light-industry sectors!
					
					 Give top priority to the supply of equipment, materials and electricity required for coal production!
					
					 Working people in the sector of the metallurgical industry!
					
					 Become the vanguard and roots for the building of a thriving nation!
					
					 Hit the target for iron and steel production without fail by dint of the mental strength of Kangson!
					
					 Using no coking coal constitutes the lifeline of the development of the metallurgical industry!
					
					 Bring the Juche iron production system to perfection!
					
					 Be proactive in introducing the techniques of high-temperature air combustion by coal gasification!
					
					 Production of heavy-duty rails is the battle order the Party has given to the workers at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex!
					
					 Send larger quantities of iron ore to metallurgical factories!
					
					 Increase rail transport capacity to haul freight more and faster!
					
					 Carry on the organization and control of transport to the last detail and establish iron discipline!
					
					 Let us radically upgrade the railways of the country!
					
					 Build up railways to be modern and heavy-duty!
					
					 Step up dynamically the rehabilitation of the northern railways!
					
					 Smarten up railway stations and the surroundings of the trunk lines!
					
					Technological revolution means a revolution in the production of machines and tools!
					
					 Produce more state-of-the-art machinery including major ordered equipment!
					
					 Mass-produce modern tools!
					
					 Complete the gasification project for the second serial process at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and the project of the petrochemical system at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex at the earliest possible date!
					
					 Fertilizer means rice and rice means a thriving nation!
					
					 Produce Juche fertilizer in a large amount and send it to the rural areas!
					
					 Produce and supply the materials for light industry including vinalon and vinyl chloride in adequate amounts!
					
					 Discover more underground resources!
					
					 Boost the production of nonferrous metals and nonmetallic minerals!
					
					 Effect an upsurge in the production of timber!
					
					 Produce high-quality wooden products in larger quantities!
					
					 Launch a scientific drive of fishing to catch much more of fishes!
					
					 Develop seafood cultivation, fish-farming in the sea and farming fishery on a large scale to increase the production of marine products!
					
					 Put fish farming on a Juche-oriented, scientific and intensive footing to ensure that the sea and even the mountainous regions teem with fish!
					
					 Expand and develop foreign trade to fully supply the materials and funds needed for building the country into an economic giant and improving the people’s living standards!
					
					 Accelerate to the maximum the major construction projects scheduled to be completed on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of the fatherly leader!
					
					 Let us take responsibility for the safety of the projects and guarantee their absolute quality for all eternity!
					
					 Let us build Pyongyang into a world-class city equipped with the revolutionary view of the leader!
					
					 Make the Mansudae area filled with grand monumental structures of lasting value!
					
					 Apply the principle of formative and artistic beauty in construction to the letter!
					
					 Let vessels blow whistles of victory at the Tanchon Port on the meaningful Day of the Sun! 
					
					 Bring about an innovation in designing, the first process of construction!
					
					 Supply cement and other building materials in larger quantities to the major construction sites!
					
					 Turn quarries and stone dressing factories into world-class production bases of natural stone materials!
					
					 Mass-produce beautifully dressed stones of high quality!
					
					 Let us change the appearance of the land by effecting a new turn in land and environment protection!
					
					 Let us cover the whole country with trees and flowers!
					
					 Put the production of saplings on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis!
					
					 Build up roads for modern, heavy-duty and high-speed purposes!
					
					 Bring about a radical turn in urban management!
					
					 Turn all the urban and rural areas into socialist fairylands thick with trees and flowers and resounding with people’s laughter!
					
					 Improving economic management is a key to developing the economy and raising the people’s standard of living!
					
					 Vigorously organize and command economic work!
					
					 Stick to the socialist principles and ensure profitability in economic management!
					
					 Administer the economy scientifically on the basis of detailed calculation!
					
					 Satisfy fully the requirements of the socialist principle of distribution!
					
					 Conduct the administrative and economic work in a political way!
					
					 Enforce strict discipline in planning, financial affairs and labour administration!
					
					 Today our Party demands that we bring about a radical change in the features of the country’s economy in response to the flames of the industrial revolution in the new century kindled by the great General during his field guidance at the Huichon Ryonha General Machine Factory.
					
					 The industrial revolution in the new century is a gigantic struggle to build our country into a power with a knowledge-based economy of our own style by dint of the drive to break through the cutting edge, an earnest instruction of the great General and the strategic line of building our country into an economic giant.
					
					 Developers at the Ryonha Machine!
					
					 Lead vigorously the building of our country into a power with a knowledge-based economy in the vanguard of the industrial revolution in the new century true to the noble intentions of the great General!
					
					 Develop and manufacture in a larger number high-performance CNC machine tools, high-speed, precision and intelligent!
					
					 All scientists, technicians and workers!
					
					Vigorously accelerate the industrial revolution in the new century, learning from the fighting spirit and mettle of the developers at the Ryongha Machine!
					
					 Break through the cutting-edge!
					
					 Keep your feet firmly planted on this land and look out over the world!
					
					 Raise the level of the technical equipment of the national economy to that of the Ryonha Machine!
					
					 Be proactive in pioneering and developing new industrial branches based on the up-to-the-minute technology!
					
					 Make a great leap forward in the development of basic core technologies and latest science and technologies!
					
					Strengthen creative cooperation among scientists, technicians and producers!
					
					 Realize the integration of science and technology and production!
					
					 Achieve more successes in producing things, Juche-oriented and home-made!
					
					 Build model factories, renovated and scientifically based, all over the country!
					
					 Push ahead with the modernization of communications as required by the era of knowledge-based economy, the IT age!
					
					 Make great innovations in the development of the electronics industry!
					
					Today’s struggle for a great upsurge is an acute confrontation with the imperialist reactionaries. In order to emerge victorious in this confrontation, all the people must display high the spirit of defending the leader unto death and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude. 
					
					 Let us defend with our very lives the leadership of the revolution with the victorious great upsurge!
					
					 When the Party is determined, we can do anything!
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Paektu is the eternal spirit of Korea!
					
					 Live and struggle in the revolutionary soldier spirit!
					
					 Let us carry out the Party’s lines and policies at the risk of our lives with the mettle displayed by the developers at the Ryonha Machine and the people of Hamnam!
					
					 Break the chains of the enemy’s sanctions with the hammer of self-reliance!
					
					 Make the enemies shudder at the song of victory in the great upsurge sung by heroic Korea!
					
					 Let us shatter defeatism and conservatism and rise up by our own efforts!
					
					 Our great, prosperous and powerful country will be a highly civilized one with developed culture, and the flames of a great revolutionary upsurge must flare up more fiercely in the cultural sector, too.
					
					 Bring about a new turn in education as required by the era of knowledge-based economy!
					
					 Bring up the reliable backbone of the Songun revolution possessing the noble spirit and profound knowledge!
					
					 Enhance the quality of education and provide the means and environment of teaching at the highest standard!
					
					 Bring about a radical turn in public health service!
					
					Increase the production of medicines and medical appliances!
					
					 Be the “engineers” of human lives possessing warm human love and utmost sincerity!
					
					 Raise the level of medical science and technology to the world standards!
					
					 Let us make our country a football and sports power!
					
					 Make physical culture and sports mass-based and part of everyday life to be fully ready for labour and national defence!
					
					 Usher in a golden age of literature and the arts in the Songun era by learning from the creative attitude and spirit of the Unhasu Orchestra!
					
					 Enrich the treasure house of Juche art with such masterpieces as the drama We Will Recollect Today!
					
					 Media persons, become ideological guards defending the Party with writing brush and buglers sounding the march for a great upsurge!
					
					 Government organs, be householders that look after the people’s living in a responsible manner!
					
					 Let us establish revolutionary order and discipline throughout society by observing socialist law strictly!
					
					 Working people’s organizations, fulfil your duty as transmission belts for the Party and its assistant in the campaign for a great upsurge!
					
					 Working people’s organizations, give free rein to the mental strength of your members and organize and launch dynamic socialist emulation drives and other mass movements!
					
					All officials!
					
					 Success in the general march for realizing the great Comrade Kim Jong Il’s desire for the building of a thriving country depends on you, commanding personnel of the revolution.
					
					 Now is the time when officials should verify their loyalty to the Party, revolution and people in front of them.
					
					 Be reliable commanding personnel who throw in their lot with the Party for ever on the road of revolution even if storms rage!
					
					 Let us live and fight like the officials in the period of laying the Party’s foundation for carrying forward the cause of Juche in the 1970s!
					
					 Be commanding officers on the forefront of the campaign for a great upsurge!
					
					 Are you living and working like the heroine of the drama We Will Recollect Today?
					
					 Become people’s faithful servants who wholeheartedly support the idea of The People Are My God of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!
					
					 We serve the people!
					
					 Share joy and sorrow with the people and provide them with conveniences absolutely and as the highest priority! 
					
					 Glory and happiness to the people, and work and pains to our officials!
					
					 Be competent officials in the age of the knowledge-based economy who are possessed of the latest science and technology and who have profound knowledge!
					
					 All Party members!
					
					 In the van of the all-out charge for the victory in the building of a thriving nation General Kim Jong Il wished so earnestly, there should be you, the members of the Workers’ Party of Korea, whom he guaranteed dearest political integrity and trained to be vanguard fighters of the revolution.
					
					 Be the vanguard fighters defending the leader at the risk of your lives and standard-bearers implementing Party policy in a do-or-die spirit!
					
					 Play the vanguard role in the all-out charge for the great victory in 2012!
					
					 Kindle the flames of leap forward and innovation in the hearts of the masses through powerful political work and practical examples!
					
					Young people!
					
					 The torch of a great revolutionary upsurge is the one you should carry in the van as the leading part in the building of a prosperous nation and the masters of the future.
					
					 Demonstrate the mettle of Korean youth in the advance for a great upsurge to implement the instructions of the great General!
					
					 Advance bravely and valiantly in the van of the great upsurge, singing loudly March of the Korean Youth!
					
					Forward, young people, keeping in step with the Songun commander!
					
					 Let young people undertake both national defence and socialist construction!
					
					 Demonstrate your wisdom and courage in the construction of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station and the rehabilitation of the northern railways!
					
					 Members of trade unions, agricultural workers’ union and women’s union!
					
					 Become performers of feats of labour in the campaign for a great upsurge to achieve national prosperity!
					
					All citizens!
					
					 The ongoing march for a great upsurge is an all-people march to realize the patriotic ideal of the great General, and the source of miracle to win victory in the great upsurge is the strength of civic consciousness and patriotism pulsating in your hearts.
					
					 Devote your heart and soul to your motherland!
					
					 Keep pace with the ranks of patriots in the Songun era!
					
					 See my creations if you want to know my patriotism!
					
					 Become patriots who work not only for your own province and unit but for the whole country!
					
					 Let us live not merely for today but for tomorrow!
					
					 Let us become stout roots of a thriving country!
					
					 We will recollect with great pride today of faith and will in the future replete with victory and prosperity!
					
					 Let us thoroughly carry out the instructions of President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il for national reunification!
					
					 Let us open a new phase of independent reunification in 2012 that marks the 40th anniversary of publication of the three principles of national reunification and the fifth anniversary of publication of the October 4 Declaration!
					
					 Let us resolutely frustrate the moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad for confrontation and war!
					
					 Let us wipe out the group of wicked traitors hell-bent on fratricidal confrontation!
					
					 Let us hasten the dawn of reunification by pooling efforts of the Korean nation itself under the banner of the north-south joint declarations!
					
					 Let us glorify for ever the exploits of external activities performed by the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us expand and develop the friendly and good-neighbourly relations with all the countries of the world that respect our sovereignty!
					
					 All Party members, service personnel and people!
					
					 The history of the heroic “Arduous March”, in which we turned adversity into blessing by valiantly braving the sea of bitter tears following the great General Kim Jong Il, is inspiring us, and the echo of whistle his field train blew till the last moment of his life is calling on us all to vigorously advance along the road of continuous revolution, the road of patriotism.
					
					 Let us make the whistle of the field train sounded by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il on the forefront of the revolution reverberate throughout the country as the drum of victory in the great upsurge!
					
					 Let us develop the flames of the great upsurge kindled by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il into the spectacular display of fireworks symbolizing a powerful and prosperous country!
					
					 Let us glorify the year 2012 that marks the centenary of the birth of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung and the 70th birthday of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il as the year of sacred inheritance and the year of brilliant prosperity!

articles.title: Gold and Silver Coins to Be Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
Gold and Silver Coins to Be Issued in DPRK

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Commemorative coins will be issued in the DPRK on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was promulgated on Dec. 23 in this regard.
					
					 Gold and silver coins "20th anniversary of great Comrade Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army" will be issued.
					
					 Engraved in the center of the front side of the gold and silver coins is the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il in marshal's uniform and seen in their upper parts are letters "The 20th anniversary of great Comrade Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA" and in their lower parts figures "1991-2011" and 20 five-pointed stars.
					
					 Engraved in bold relief in the center of their back sides is the star of marshal and seen in their upper parts are letters "DPRK Central Bank" and in their lower parts the degree of their purity and weight and the year of their issue.
					
					 The gold coin is 35 millimeters in diameter and 2 millimeters in thickness. It's made of pure gold.
					
					 The silver coin is 40 millimeters in diameter and 3 millimeters in thickness. It's made of pure silver.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Thrice-cursed Crimes Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Thrice-cursed Crimes Slammed

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors committed thrice-cursed crimes by seriously hurting the dignity of the DPRK and brutally suppressing south Korean mourners of various social standings, a clear indication of their sinister aim to escalate the confrontation with it on the occasion of the great loss to the nation. 
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Saturday issued a statement condemning them. 
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The group of traitors blocked visits of south Korean mourners of all strata, snatched condolence messages and desecrated them. Moreover, it brutally cracked down upon those who set up mourning stations and forcibly tore those who played a leading role in the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration off the party of Ri Hui Ho and Hyon Jong Un when the former intended to join it, thus making their visit to Pyongyang abortive. 
					
					 The puppet group staged madcap saber-rattling in the area along the Military Demarcation Line and waters around the five islands in the West Sea, in particular. Not content with this, the group instigated human scum to scatter several times anti-DPRK leaflets with the help of balloons during the mourning period, rubbing salt into the wounds of so many grief-stricken people. This was a dastardly provocation baffling human imagination. 
					
					 We had already sternly warned of the group's unethical rowdyism and served warnings against the dangerous impact it would have on the north-south relations.
					
					  The puppet group, however, did not pay any heed to this but chose to totally sever those relations, far from working to mend them.  
					
					 Now that the nature of the confrontation-minded group and its ulterior intention have been brought to light, there is no reason for us to say anything to it or closely follow it. 
					
					 The group dared infringe upon our dignity, hurting compatriots bitterly grieving the greatest loss to the nation. These unethical crimes and treachery committed by the group are unprecedented in history. This glaringly shows what rude political gangsters the group is and what despicable immoral and depraved horde it is.
					
					 The thrice-cursed crimes the group committed by mercilessly hurting the compatriots who have shared joy and sorrow since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration put into the shade the acts of treachery perpetrated by the "civilian" veiled fascist clique 17 years back. That is why these crimes are making not only the servicepersons and people of the DPRK but all the compatriots shake with towering resentment. 
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak was none other than the criminal who masterminded all these crimes and the real culprit of evils. 
					
					 He is the worst type anti-reunification element, traitor and pro-U.S. fascist maniac steeped in extreme bitterness towards compatriots and confrontation hysteria to the marrow of his bones.
					
					 It is clear that there is nothing to expect from the inter-Korean relations and the nation will suffer only calamities and misfortune as long as this guy stays in office. This is the final conclusion drawn by the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, reflecting the towering resentment of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK and all the Koreans, decisively declares that the DPRK will never pardon the unethical crimes and treachery of the group of traitors who hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership and it is left with no option but to finally settle accounts with the Lee group unless it apologizes for the above-said crimes. He who acted against the will of Heaven deserves punishment by it.
					
					 The group of traitors is sure to face a stern judgment by history and the nation and go to ruin for committing the greatest wrongs and hurting the compatriots in bitter grief over the greatest loss.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Democratic Congo

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Joseph Kabila Kabange upon his reelection as president of Democratic Congo.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work for national unity and social progress.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sudanese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Sudanese President

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on the 56th anniversary of its independence.
					
					 Kim in the message heartily wished the president and the government of Sudan successes in the efforts to ensure peace and stability of the country and achieve the economic development and the Sudanese people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Message of Greetings from Chinese President
articles.content:
Message of Greetings from Chinese President

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greetings from Hu Jintao, chairman of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, on Dec. 31.
					
					 The message said as follows:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you upon your assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA.
					
					 The peoples and armies of China and the DPRK have deep traditional friendship.
					
					 I believe that the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation will steadily consolidate and develop in the new historic condition.
					
					 I wish you success in your important work.

articles.title: New Year Greeting from Chinese President
articles.content:
New Year Greeting from Chinese President

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a new year card from Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China on the new year 2012. 
					
					 It was delivered on Saturday to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai.

articles.title: Condolatory Messages from Many Countries
articles.content:
Condolatory Messages from Many Countries

					 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received messages expressing deep condolences on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il from party leaders, ministries and high-ranking personages of many countries. 
					
					 They are the general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the leader of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), the general secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Norodom Ranariddh Party of Cambodia, the chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, the chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, the first secretary and the secretary of the C.C., the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden, the chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden, the chairman, the vice-chairman who doubles as the international secretary and general secretary of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the general secretary of the Socialist Party of Peru, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Rwanda, the head of International Department of the C.C., the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), the member of the Central Executive Co mmittee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, the vice-chairman of the Workers' Party of Turkey, the deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana, the national secretary of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, the international secretary of the Communist Party of Brazil, the secretary-general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council who is director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the director-general of the International Kim Il Sung Fund, the director of the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia, the head of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E.
